snippet: Sporadic cases of abuse, even deaths, of adopted Russian children in the United States have inflamed the Russian public.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin voices support for sanctions on American judges and others accused of having violated rights of adopted Russian children in United States; legislation is being proposed in retaliation for bill passed by Congress to punish people from Russia accused of violating human rights.
lead_paragraph: Sporadic cases of abuse, even deaths, of adopted Russian children in the United States have inflamed the Russian public.

headline.seo: Putin Backs Penalizing U.S. Judges In Adoption Cases
headline.main: Putin Backs Penalizing U.S. Judges in Adoptions
headline.print_headline: Putin Backs Penalizing U.S. Judges In Adoptions

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
